channel.title: directory on nullvoice
channel.description: Recent content in directory on nullvoice

item.title: yup, new website again.
item.description:
ngl this ended up sounding way cheesier than i expected. also i’m too lazy to make it anymore cohesive. sorry lmfao

years in the making, so many different websites and many iterations later. i’ve done it again. however clumsy and amateurish i may still be, this time i’m more confident than ever.

item.title: good sample pack
item.description: a joke ‘sample pack’ i made by randomizing all the parameters of a sequenced drum machine plugin. various - mostly unusable loops - at 128, 140, and 174 bpm. try and make something with it!

item.title: perfectfyfth.helmbank
item.description: a collection of patches i made for the open-source software synthesizer Helm from 2018 to 2021. most of these were used in the released tracks of the time.
